Author: dpapathanasiou
Content: Just another reminder that acquisition cannot be your only exit strategy.

Author: Alex3917
Content:
Use your customers as references. If you don't have customers, use the people who said they'd probably buy your product if it existed.

Also, you aren't going to get 250k without at the very least a bunch of informal advisors, so list those people too.

Author: volida
Content:
xobni.com, reddit.com, pollground.com, loopt.com, weebly.com

which else?

Author: wioota
Content: This was a great read and the patterns of growth and strategies they used hold true even for much less extreme scaling.

Author: Chingy
Content: You should be able to vote down bad stories.  I thought this wouldn't be needed but we're starting to get off-topic submissions, so we need to be able to bury them.
